attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2011-1664

Date: 2011-12-15

   Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Robert W. Jenkins, de la ville de White Rock dans la province de la Colombie-Britannique, l’un des conseillers juridiques de Sa Majesté, soit nommé juge de la Cour suprême de la Colombie-Britannique, à compter du 31 décembre 2011.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Robert W. Jenkins, of the City of White Rock, in the Province of British Columbia, one of Her Majesty’s counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 31, 2011.

	 	 Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Robert W. The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Robert W. Jenkins, of the City of White Rock, in the Province of British Columbia, one of Her Majesty’s counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 31, 2011.
